title: Biden picks an acting FCC chair
description:
President Biden has named Jessica Rosenworcel as acting chair of the FCC, following Trump-appointee Ajit Pai’s departure. Recode’s Sara Morrison explains what this might mean for the future of the agency.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:title: Biden picks an acting FCC chair
itunes:author: Recode
itunes:subtitle: Biden’s FCC may bring back net neutrality and help Americans stay connected.
